original_text: After Isaac finished blessing him, and Jacob had scarcely left his father’s presence, his brother Esau came in from hunting.
korean_text: 이삭이 야곱에게 축복하기를 마치매 야곱이 그의 아버지 이삭 앞에서 나가자 곧 그의 형 에서가 사냥하여 돌아온지라

sentences.original_text: and Jacob had scarcely left his father's presence
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱이 아버지의 앞에서 거의 막 떠났을 때

sentences.original_text: his brother Esau came in from hunting
